==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Punch
|desc_1      = Punches twice, dealing '''80% ATK''', '''90% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2      = Kick
|desc_2      = Performs a kick, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3      = Harpoon Throw
|desc_3      = Throws a harpoon at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and consuming the harpoon. The Flowing Blade Harpoon-Thrower possesses 2 harpoons initially, and will no longer use this attack once they are both consumed.

|name_4      = Knife Throw
|desc_4      = Throws a knife at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used when both harpoons are consumed.

|name_5      = Triple Wavecrash
|desc_5      = Charges at the player 3 times, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} upon contact.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A warrior from the source of the springs, and a tribal guardian that patrols the waters and shores.<br>Underestimate the incredible skills these brave trident-wielding warriors have gained through hunting and fishing at your peril. It is said that in the past, tribespeople would use these skills to hunt massive sea beasts with fins and scales as tough as iron.|[[Archive]]}}
